content: I'll make sure to set up a quiet and comfortable space for the spa day. My mom loves soft music, so I'll play some calming instrumental music in the background. I'll also use the "Sweet Pea" scented candles and massage oil to complement the gift set I got her. By the way, I think she also loved the cashmere scarf I got her for $70 during the holiday season. Do you have any recommendations for a healthy snack or drink that I can offer her during the spa day?
